text: Although Soules called 911 to report the crash, he left the scene after paramedics arrived. He was later arrested and charged with leaving the scene of a fatal accident. The prosecution previously claimed Soules bought alcohol prior to the crash, and that open containers were found in his truck. As Gossip Cop has reported, Soules was involved in a deadly accident in April. The former star of “ The Bachelor ” collided with a tractor on a rural Iowa road, sending his truck and the tractor into opposite roadside ditches. The diver of the tractor, Kenny Mosher, died from injuries sustained in the collision. Chris Soules had no alcohol in his system after his fatal crash, according to new court documents furnished to Gossip Cop. Find out the latest developments below. Upon his arrest, he was tested
